item.title: Enrolment in Medicine and Surgery, Dental Medicine, Veterinary Medicine
Call for the English language development course in view of the B2 First (FCE) exam - SOLD OUT
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B2 First (FCE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in October-November at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Italian Erasmus
item.description: The Italian Erasmus is a national student mobility programme based on agreements between Italian universities.%0AThe call for applications and all other information are available on the Italian Erasmus page.%0A
